markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 250</row>

Items with this trait are artifacts. These magic items can't be crafted by normal means, and they can't be damaged by normal means. Artifacts are always [rare](/Traits.aspx?ID=137) or [unique](/Traits.aspx?ID=161).
name: Artifact
